#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <climits>
#include <algorithm>
#include <queue>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>
#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <utility>
#include <iomanip>
#include <string>
#include <stack>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <deque>
#include <ctime>
#define pb push_back
#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
const int N=1e5+7;
ll power(ll a,ll b)
{
 ll res=1;
 while(b)
 {
  if(b&1)
  res=res*a;
  res%=mod;
  a=(a*a)%mod;
  b/=2;
 }
 return res;
}
vector<int>fir,sec;
 int t,n,i,c,su,f;
  int a[102+1];
  int mark[101];
void rec(int id,vector<int>tmp,int sum)
{
 if(f==1)
 return;
 else if(su-sum<=c)
 {
 f=1;
 for(i=0;i<tmp.size();++i)
 {
 mark[tmp[i]]=1;
 fir.pb(tmp[i]);
 }
 }
 else if(id==n)
 return;
 else
 {
  if(sum+a[id]<=c)
  {
   tmp.pb(id);
   rec(id+1,tmp,sum+a[id]);
   tmp.pop_back();
   rec(id+1,tmp,sum);
  }
 }
}
int main()
{
int dp[100+1][10000+1];
 cin>>t;
 while(t--)
 {
 fir.clear();
 sec.clear();
  memset(mark,0,sizeof(mark));
  su=0;
  scanf("%d%d",&n,&c);
  for(i=0;i<n;++i)
  {
  scanf("%d",&a[i]);
  su+=a[i];
  }
  sort(a,a+n);
  if(2*c<su)
  {
  printf("NO\n");
  continue;
  }
  dp[0][0]=1;
  for(i=1;i<=su;++i)
  dp[0][i]=0;
  dp[0][a[0]]=1;
  for(i=1;i<n;++i)
  for(int j=0;j<=su;++j)
  if(j-a[i]>=0 && dp[i-1][j-a[i]]==1)
  dp[i][j]=1;
  else
  dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j];
  if(c>=su)
  {
   printf("YES\n");
   printf("\n");
   for(i=0;i<n;++i)
   printf("%d ",a[i]);
   printf("\n");
  }
  else
  {
  int f1=0;
  for(i=0;i<=c;++i)
  if(su-i<=c && dp[n-1][i]==1)
  {
   f1=1;
   break;
  }
  if(f1==0)
  {
  printf("NO\n");
  continue;
  }
  vector<int>tmp;
  f=0;
  rec(0,tmp,0);
  for(i=0;i<n;++i)
  if(mark[i]==0)
  sec.pb(i);
  if(f==0)
  printf("NO\n");
  else
  {
   printf("YES\n");
   for(i=0;i<fir.size();++i)
   printf("%d ",a[fir[i]]);
   printf("\n");
   for(i=0;i<sec.size();++i)
   printf("%d ",a[sec[i]]);
   printf("\n");
  }
  }
 }
 return 0;
 }
